title: Fix database integration test failure - missing group_members table
description:
The CI test suite is failing due to a database schema issue. The SQLite integration tests are failing with "no such table: group_members" error, indicating the database schema is not properly initialized during tests.

Error details:
- Job ID: 56292406647
- Failed step: Run tests with race detection (Step 7)
- Error: failed to add group member: no such table: group_members
- Test file: internal/database/integration_test.go:145
- URL: https://github.com/cecil-the-coder/Cortex/actions/runs/19655958532/job/56292406647

title: Fix test assertion failure - expected 1+ but got 0
description:
The database integration test is failing with an assertion error: "0" is not greater than or equal to "1" at line 183. This suggests an operation that's expected to return at least 1 item is returning 0.

Test file: internal/database/integration_test.go:183
Test: TestDatabaseIntegration/SQLite_integration
